ResearchProjectDef.label: Starfleet Assembler Blueprints
ResearchProjectDef.description: The initial research into pre-replicator technology, allowing for a moderate level of automation when it comes to molecular reassembling. This research is the first step in developing colony grade replicator technology. Grants access to standard uniform designs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Starfleet Replicator Technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research into the available assembler blueprints have opened a pathway to basic replicator technology - access to some basic foods and supply. This research grants the blueprint for the standard, energy hungry replicator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Starfleet Phaser Technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: With a functioning replicator, access to the intricate components required for hand and rifle grade phasers mean that engineers only have to do a bit more work to develop designs for our specific replicator to print hand and rifle grade phasers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Starfleet Security Technologies
ResearchProjectDef.description: Starfleet requisition templates have been receieved for security technologies. It will take a few days to upload and adapt the code to our replicators to produce the components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Starfleet Phased Pulse Technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: While traditional phasers are designed with functionality in mind, advances in phased plasma has pushed for a compressed pulse - allowing for a higher rate of fire and stronger blasts. This technology leads to development of the pulse phaser rifle, a weapon commonly deployed to sustained ground operations and special forces.
